name: Dream Delivery
description:
Hello, new delivery person! Welcome to the force. Here at dream delivery, we deliver dreams in boxes to people across the world. You will have to brave rough terrain, mean enemies, and bad weather. There are also some big baddies scattered across the dream landscape that may want to cause you some trouble. Because of this, we have armed you with a dream star, a long ranged weapon that you can use to fight them off. Good luck!

Programming, sprites, and sound effects by SevenSoft.

Music by Rolemusic and squaresawsound.
